155.movie_plot: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game.

147.movie_plot: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

158.movie_plot: Two years after the first series of murders, a new psychopath dons the Ghostface costume and a new string of killings begins.

146.movie_plot: A man struggles with memories of his past, including a wife he cannot remember, in a nightmarish world with no sun.

168.movie_plot: A woman moves into an exclusive New York City apartment building, which she soon discovers houses tenants with all manner of shocking secrets.
